metadata.Title: CVE-2015-5128 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
** REJECT **  DO NOT USE THIS CANDIDATE NUMBER.  ConsultIDs: none.  Reason:This candidate was withdrawn by its CNA.  Further investigation showed thatit was not a security issue.  Notes: none.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-5128` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

flashplugin-downloader - 11.2.202.508ubuntu0.14.04.1
flashplugin-installer - 11.2.202.508ubuntu0.14.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: flashplugin-nonfree package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '11.2.202.508ubuntu0.14.04.1').
